front.title: Cable Gateway Security Management Information Base for CableHome compliant Residential Gateways

abstract.t: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. In particular, it defines a basic set of managed objects for SNMP- based security management of CableHome 1.0 compliant residential gateway devices. This memo specifies a MIB module in a manner that is compliant to the SNMP SMIv2 [5][6][7]. The set of objects is consistent with the SNMP framework and existing SNMP standards.
